Posts.Content: Ive read all this with interest. This is my first reply to anyone. I hsve triple negative metaststic carcinoma secondary breast cancer. My chemo starts on 4 sept. Ive done research as its tablet form zeloda and i know what i might expect. But im scared if outying that first pill in my mouth. Lets keep in touch and compare notes even tho we are on different chemo . All the very best xxx
Posts.Title: Starting chemo in 11 days.....

Posts.Content: Ive just about recovered from a delayed reconstruction back on 10 January. Again radiotherapy played a part in why it was delayed. I had an implant for two years which grew hard and very uncomfortable. Im loving my new look and am glad I delayed. Unfirtunately ive just been diognosed with secondary breast cancer in lymphatic system. More fighting awaits. Hope all goes well for you
